description:
Lefebvre was an Alliance vice admiral who commanded the 3rd Fleet by 796 UC, from the battleship http://anidb.net/ch82271 [Cu Chulainn]. That year, he took part in the invasion of the http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Galactic Empire] and fought at the battle of Lesing against the fleet of Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch188 [August Samuel Wahlen]. Lefebvre was killed in action when the Cu Chulainn was destroyed, along with most of the 3rd Fleet.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Lefebvre
